<title level="1" right="Hazard 2" pfs="">[Volatile Reagents](/Hazards.aspx?ID=162)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Complex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=30" />
<trait label="Environmental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=62" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 38</row>

**Complexity** Complex

</column>

Potion bottles, alembics, and potent ingredients violently explode when jostled and accidentally combined.

---

**Stealth**
+5 (trained)

**Disable**
three DC 20 [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) checks to sort and separate the bottles of volatile ingredients into groups

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 18, **Fort** +10, **Ref** +8

**HP**
10 (BT 5)

**Immunities**
critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Explosive Catalyst** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Slick drinks Gattlebee's growth serum (page 36); **Effect** The giant lizard bumps into lab tables and workbenches, causing dangerous ingredients to intermix and detonate. The hazard rolls initiative.

---
**Routine**
(1 action) A random 10-foot square in Gattlebee's laboratory explodes, dealing 2d6 damage to creatures and objects in the area (DC 18 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The damage type is randomly determined each round: acid, cold, electricity, fire, slashing, or sonic.

---
**Reset**
The lab contains enough ingredients for this hazard to last 1 minute before all materials are expended. Alternatively, the hazard resets once Slick shrinks to regular size (see below).
